name: Trick Or Retreat 2
description:
Your ship is about to run out of fuel, fill it up again using candy 'borrowed' from passing trick or treaters, while avoiding the dumb birds that smash into you and threaten to knock you out of the sky

If the game doesn't run let me know and I'll switch it from GLES3 to GLES2

Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Hover over trick or treaters for 2-3 seconds to beam up their candy. If the beam blinks the timer starts over
